metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25510 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: NVIDIA CUDA Toolkit SDK for Linux and Windows contains a NULL pointerdereference in cuobjdump, where a local user running the tool against amalformed binary may cause a limited denial of service.

criterions.comment: nvidia-cuda-toolkit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
